  • Method Details

    • build

      public void build(float[] Vertices, int[] Indices)
      Description copied from interface: DTriMeshData
      Build a TriMesh data object with single precision vertex data. In Java, the number of vertices and indices are derived from the length of the arrays. Strides can not be set because GIMPACT assumes strides to be 3.
      Parameters:
      Vertices - vertices
      Indices - indices
